triples.name: Recommender system
triples.relevance: The core problem domain being addressed - the survey covers methods for building recommendation systems that suggest relevant items to users.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The main methodology framework being surveyed for solving recommendation problems through sequential decision-making.

triples.name: Collaborative filtering
triples.relevance: A traditional recommendation method discussed as a baseline approach that RL aims to improve upon.

triples.name: Content-based filtering
triples.relevance: A traditional recommendation method using item features that RL-based approaches are compared against.

triples.name: Markov decision process
triples.relevance: The formal mathematical framework used to formulate the recommendation problem for RL solution.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The enabling technology that made RL practical for large-scale recommendation systems with high-dimensional state and action spaces.
